  10. from .notification import Notification
  12. def repo_choices():
  13. choices = tuple()
  14. if BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['username'] and BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['password']:
  15. choices = choices + (('bb', 'BitBucket'),)
  17. if GITHUB_SETTINGS['username'] and GITHUB_SETTINGS['password']:
  18. choices = choices + (('gh', 'Github'),)
  20. return choices
  23. class Service(models.Model):
  25. ftp_host = models.CharField('Host', max_length=255)
  26. ftp_username = models.CharField('Username', max_length=50)
  27. ftp_password = models.CharField('Password', max_length=50)
  28. ftp_path = models.CharField('Path', max_length=255)
  30. repo_source = models.CharField('Source', max_length=10, choices=repo_choices())
  31. repo_name = models.CharField('Respository Name', max_length=50)
  32. repo_slug_name = models.SlugField('Respository Slug', max_length=50)
  33. repo_branch = models.CharField('Branch', max_length=50)
  34. repo_hook = models.BooleanField(default=False)
  36. secret_key = models.CharField('Secret Key', unique=True, max_length=30, default=lambda: ''.join(random.choice(string.letters + string.digits) for x in range(30)))
  38. status = models.BooleanField(default=True)
  39. status_message = models.TextField()
  40. notification = models.ForeignKey(Notification, null=True, blank=True, on_delete=models.SET_NULL)
  41. created = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
  42. updated = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
  44. def __unicode__(self):
  45. return self.repo_name
  47. def deploys(self):
  48. return self.log_set.filter(status=True).count()
  50. def fail_deploys(self):
  51. return self.log_set.filter(status=False).filter(skip=False).count()
  53. def skipped_deploys(self):
  54. return self.log_set.filter(status=False).filter(skip=True).count()
  56. def latest_log_date(self):
  57. return self.log_set.latest('created').created
  59. def latest_log_user(self):
  60. return self.log_set.latest('created').user
  62. def hook_url(self):
  63. return reverse('ftpdeploy_deploy', kwargs={'secret_key': self.secret_key})
  65. def get_logs_tree(self):
  66. """get logs tree for restore deploys. Include all logs since first fail apart of skiped."""
  67. first_fail_log = self.log_set.filter(status=0).order_by('pk')[:1]
  68. logs = self.log_set.filter(skip=0).filter(pk__gte=first_fail_log[0].pk).order_by('pk')
  69. return logs
  71. def lock(self):
  72. return self.task_set.filter(active=True).exists()
  74. def has_queue(self):
  75. return self.task_set.all().exists()
  77. def check(self, **kwargs):
  79. message = list()
  80. fails, message = service_check(self).check_all()
  82. if fails[2]:
  83. self.repo_hook = False
  84. else:
  85. self.repo_hook = True
  87. if True in fails:
  88. self.status_message = '<br>'.join(message)
  89. self.status = False
  90. else:
  91. self.status = True
  92. self.status_message = ''
